version_description:
App now provides notifications for exclusive offers and additional information. This version also enables clients to buy items directly through mobile application.
Minor bug fixes

Complete application redesign.
We have made app faster and better UX for you.

Some of the features we improved and added:
- View featured services, offers and vouchers
- Search by any keyword, category, distance
- Buy vouchers and view codes on the app
- Manage your Fazaa membership account

More coming soon ! Please rate our app !

- Bugfixes
- Map search
- New filters and filter layout
- Lease to own and insurance requests from the app

Bug fixes, improvements.
We are working hard to enhance your user experience
and to deliver best performance to our members.

Manage your prepaid card option added !
We continue to work on new features and improvements to your experience

Manage your prepaid card option added !
We continue to work on new features and improvements to your experience

Digital Fazaa membership card added to main screen.
We continue optimising app for your best experience.

We added biometric sign in option in settings and added many bug fixes and improvements.
Thank you for all your support and continuing feedback !
